title: Jam 2021: Equity and Social Justice
short_description: Are you a college or university student ready to join an open and frank discussion about equity and social justice issues in the museum?
header_description: Join this open and frank discussion of equity and social justice issues in the museum.
list_description: Are you a college or university student ready to join an open and frank discussion about equity and social justice issues in the museum?
description:
Speakers:

Sarah Gray, Director, Member and Visitor Engagement
Teresa Liu, Associate Director, Relationship Management, Philanthropic Operations
Ian Damont Martin, Executive Director of Inclusion and Belonging
Rachel Echiverri Rowland, Project Manager, Academic Engagement and Research
Amy Tsegai, Public Affairs Coordinator

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
